name: Space Wars Hell
description:
2 Player shooting Game!~ 

Controls:
Player1:
W- forward, S- reverse|
A , D -left or right steer


Player2:
I- forward, K- reverse|
J , L -left or right steer
-----------------------------------------

Objective:

in 5 minutes, try to capture as many territories as you can. You can capture it by simply touching it. Enemies can kill you and you will respawn to your pod. The one who has the highest territory captured or captured all will win!

Beware of the asteroids! And bullets from the enemy as the AUTO FIRE IS ON!

Ps. getting all the 2 different powerups makes you in Rampage!
Pps. dont let it got away from you
